731100.name: Mimpi Dreams - Factory DLC
731100.description:
This DLC extends Mimpi Dreams with a whole new adventure. The Factory level is larger than any other level in the free version. It features a new story, puzzles, animations and hundreds of sounds.

Story
The factory discharges poisonous gases into the atmosphere and destroys all nature that surrounds it. Everything is the work of a ruthless boss who is only interested in money. Mimpi is asked for help by a poor plant that is desperately missing some fresh air. A hero is needed.

Puzzles
Mimpi will face both familiar and new challenges and he will again need your skills to overcome them. And it won't be easy this time. You will be on your own, unable to use balloons with hints, because the evil villain pops them all with his robotic tentacle.

Features
  • larger than any of the free levels
  • enhanced gameplay, new puzzles
  • new story, new animated characters
  • hundreds of graphical assets
  • hundreds of new sounds

About Mimpi
Mimpi is a lazy doggy who likes to sleep a lot. In his dreams, he becomes the dog hero, who rescues and saves whoever is in need of rescuing or saving! Be it a lost pirate ship, a lab rat who wants to be free or a princess held by a dragon - Mimpi hero is here to save the day. Of course, Mimpi cannot do it without his sidekick and that is YOU!

Mimpi and you are the makers of his dreams. Help Mimpi be the hero by manipulating his dreams - move obstacles to allow Mimpi to get through levels, solve puzzles and help Mimpi communicate with the creatures in his dreams.
731100.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 日语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 捷克语
